data source:   Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics Program (NPS-1)
Table 2. Inmates in custody of state and federal prison authorities and reported to be HIV positive or have confirmed AIDS, by jurisdiction, yearend 2009 and 2010
Note: Excludes inmates held in private facilities.
